components.shortDescription: Retro check-in overlay styled for ArcadeKit.
components.longDescription: Built for game-inspired onboarding flows, this React Native check-in card animates between states and keeps your monetization stats playful.

examples.descriptionOfUsage: ArcadeKit drops the overlay after every quest completion to celebrate the player.

faq.question: What integrations come built-in with this component?
faq.answer: This component can be used "as is" and was built without any specific API integration in mind.

components.metaDescription: A React Native check-in interface crafted by ArcadeKit for gamified finance apps.

components.shortDescription: ArcadeKit's neon card stack for React Native.
components.longDescription: Flip between front and back with buttery Expo animations. Perfect for showing player stats, reward balances, or cosmic credit cards.

examples.descriptionOfUsage: ArcadeKit showcases the neon card stack to select a new quest reward.

faq.question: What integrations come built-in with this component?

components.metaDescription: A shimmering game-card UI for React Native with Expo motion presets.

components.shortDescription: Co-op reward calculator for ArcadeKit missions.
components.longDescription: Let squads divvy up loot with a playful calculator UI. Built in React Native with TypeScript and ready for live data hooks.

examples.descriptionOfUsage: ArcadeKit uses the calculator to split XP bonuses between teammates.

faq.question: What integrations come built-in with this component?
faq.answer: This component can be used "as is" and was built without any specific API integration in mind.

components.metaDescription: Game-inspired revenue share UI designed by ArcadeKit for React Native.

components.shortDescription: Quest activity log styled for game economies.
components.longDescription: List every quest, drop, and purchase with gradient accents and icon slots. Ideal for tracking in-game currency or loyalty points.

examples.descriptionOfUsage: ArcadeKit highlights the activity list to recap achievements after every session.

faq.question: What integrations come built-in with this component?

components.metaDescription: An activity feed template for React Native with arcade flair.

expo-previews.shortDescription: Interactive Expo preview of a quest-tracking hub.
expo-previews.longDescription: Explore how ArcadeKit components come together inside Expo. Swap tabs, trigger confetti, and preview reward cards without leaving the browser.

examples.descriptionOfUsage: ArcadeKit embeds the Quest Hub on launch pages to stream the Expo preview live.

faq.question: Can I embed this preview on my own site?
faq.answer: Yes. Use the Expo iframe snippet provided in the docs to showcase the Quest Hub anywhere.

expo-previews.metaDescription: An Expo preview showcasing ArcadeKit components working together.
